lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie may start her season in Hawaii, but not at the Sony Open. Wie, who has played the PGA Tour event every year since 2004, did not receive one of the four unrestricted sponsor exemptions, the tournament director Ray Stosik said Thursday. The swing coach David Leadbetter said Wie may ask for exemptions at one or both of the L.P.G.A. events in Hawaii that open the women’s season in February.
